about_the_game:
On Point brings back the classic 90’s arcade vibes with a fully immersive VR shooting gallery experience for all ages and skill levels. Blast your way through over 30 minigames full of wacky non-violent fun and challenge your speed, accuracy and reaction time with the classic light-gun feel. The return of the wacky shoot-em’ up is here!



ABOUT THE DEMO
  • Try 4 ranges from three difficulties (12 total)
  • Run riot through wacky arcade action.
  • Easy, medium and hard mode.
  • The return of the wacky non-violent shoot ‘em up.
  • Immersive VR experience, tuned for all experience and comfort levels.

DESCRIPTION
  • Arcade style target shooting minigames.
  • Newcomer mode, low intensity, to ease players into VR.
  • Hardcore mode, for experienced players to challenge themselves and the leaderboards.
  • Fully in world experience.
